column4: I have vino-server remote desktop installed and working, but when I start Ubuntu without a monitor, I can only loggin remotely at 640x480. pls help,  ayuda porfa
static IP's both in router and computer work best, than DHCP
are you just doing vnc?  what do you have in your /etc/xinetd.d/Xvnc?
are you just doing vnc or xdmcp?
